verses.verse: The burden <WH4853> of Egypt <WH4714>. Behold <WH3068>, Jehovah rideth <WH7392> upon a swift <WH7031> cloud <WH5645>, and cometh <WH935> unto Egypt <WH4714>: and the idols <WH457> of Egypt <WH4714> shall tremble <WH5128> at his presence <WH6440>; and the heart <WH3824> of Egypt <WH4714> shall melt <WH4549> in the midst of it <WH7130>.

And I will stir <WH5526> up the Egyptians <WH4714> against the Egyptians <WH4714>: and they shall fight <WH3898> every one <WH376> against his brother <WH251>, and every one <WH376> against his neighbor <WH7453>; city <WH5892> against city <WH5892>, and kingdom <WH4467> against kingdom <WH4467>.

And the spirit <WH7307> of Egypt <WH4714> shall fail <WH1238> in the midst <WH7130> of it <WH1104>; and I will destroy the counsel <WH6098> thereof <WH1875>: and they shall seek unto the idols <WH457>, and to the charmers <WH328>, and to them that have familiar spirits <WH178>, and to the wizards <WH3049>.

And <WH853> I will give over <WH5534> the Egyptians <WH4714> into the hand <WH3027> of a cruel <WH7186> lord <WH113>; and a fierce <WH5794> king <WH4428> shall rule <WH4910> over them <WH5002>, saith the Lord <WH113>, Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>.
And the waters <WH4325> shall fail <WH5405> from the sea <WH3220>, and the river <WH5104> shall be wasted <WH2717> and become dry <WH3001>.

And the rivers <WH5104> shall become <WH2186> foul <WH2186>; the streams <WH2975> of Egypt <WH4693> shall be diminished <WH1809> and dried up <WH2717>; the reeds <WH7070> and flags <WH5488> shall wither away <WH7060>.

The meadows <WH6169> by the Nile <WH2975>, by the brink <WH6310> of the Nile <WH2975>, and all the sown <WH4218> fields of the Nile <WH2975>, shall become dry <WH3001>, be driven away <WH5086>, and be no more.

And the fishers <WH1771> shall lament <WH578>, and all they that cast <WH7993> angle <WH2443> into the Nile <WH2975> shall mourn <WH56>, and they that spread <WH6566> nets <WH4365> upon <WH6440> the waters <WH4325> shall languish <WH535>.
Moreover they that work <WH5647> in combed <WH8305> flax <WH6593>, and they that weave <WH707> white cloth <WH2355>, shall be confounded <WH954>.
And the pillars <WH8356> of Egypt shall be broken <WH1792> in pieces <WH6213>; all they that work for hire <WH7938> shall be grieved <WH99> in soul <WH5315>.

The princes <WH8269> of Zoan <WH6814> are utterly foolish <WH191>; the counsel <WH6098> of the wisest <WH2450> counsellors <WH3289> of Pharaoh <WH6547> is become brutish <WH1197>: how say <WH559> ye unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, I am the son <WH1121> of the wise <WH2450>, the son <WH1121> of ancient <WH6924> kings <WH4428>?

Where <WH335> then <WH645> are thy wise <WH2450> men <WH5046>? and let them tell thee now <WH3045>; and let them know what Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath purposed <WH3289> concerning Egypt <WH4714>.

The princes <WH8269> of Zoan <WH6814> are become fools <WH2973>, the princes <WH8269> of Memphis <WH5297> are deceived <WH5377>; they have caused Egypt <WH4714> to go astray <WH8582>, that are the corner-stone <WH6438> of her tribes <WH7626>.

Jehovah <WH3068> hath mingled <WH4537> a spirit <WH7307> of perverseness <WH5773> in the midst <WH7130> of her <WH4714>; and they have caused Egypt to go astray <WH8582> in every work <WH4639> thereof <WH7910>, as a drunken man staggereth <WH8582> in his vomit <WH6892>.
Neither shall there be for Egypt <WH4714> any work <WH4639>, which head <WH7218> or tail <WH2180>, palm-branch <WH3712> or rush <WH100>, may do <WH6213>.

In that day <WH3117> shall the Egyptians <WH4714> be like unto women <WH802>; and they shall tremble <WH2729> and fear <WH6342> because <WH6440> of the shaking <WH8573> of the hand <WH3027> of Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, which he shaketh over them <WH5130>.

And the land <WH127> of Judah <WH3063> shall become a terror <WH2283> unto Egypt <WH4714>; every one to whom mention <WH2142> is made thereof shall be afraid <WH6342>, because <WH6440> of the purpose <WH6098> of Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, which he purposeth against it <WH3289>.

In that day <WH3117> there shall be five <WH2568> cities <WH5892> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> that speak <WH1696> the language <WH8193> of Canaan <WH3667>, and swear <WH7650> to Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>; one <WH259> shall be called <WH559> The city <WH5892> of destruction <WH2041>.

In that day <WH3117> shall there be an altar <WH4196> to Jehovah <WH3068> in the midst <WH8432> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and a pillar <WH4676> at <WH681> the border <WH1366> thereof to Jehovah <WH3068>.

And it shall be for a sign <WH226> and for a witness <WH5707> unto Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>; for they shall cry <WH6817> unto Jehovah <WH3068> because <WH6440> of oppressors <WH3905>, and he will send <WH7971> them a saviour <WH3467>, and a defender <WH7227>, and he will deliver them <WH5337>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> shall be known <WH3045> to Egypt <WH4714>, and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> Jehovah <WH3068> in that day <WH3117>; yea <WH5647>, they shall worship with sacrifice <WH2077> and oblation <WH4503>, and shall vow <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, and shall perform it <WH7999>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> will smite <WH5062> Egypt <WH4714>, smiting <WH5062> and healing <WH7495>; and they shall return <WH7725> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, and he will be entreated <WH6279> of them <WH7495>, and will heal them.

In that day <WH3117> shall there be a highway <WH4546> out of Egypt <WH4714> to Assyria <WH804>, and the Assyrian <WH804> shall come <WH935> into Egypt <WH4714>, and the Egyptian <WH4714> into Assyria <WH804>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall worship <WH5647> with the Assyrians <WH804>.
In that day <WH3117> shall Israel <WH3478> be the third <WH7992> with Egypt <WH4714> and with Assyria <WH804>, a blessing <WH1293> in the midst <WH7130> of the earth <WH776>;

for that Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath blessed <WH1288> them <WH559>, saying, Blessed <WH1288> be Egypt <WH4714> my people <WH5971>, and Assyria <WH804> the work <WH4639> of my hands <WH3027>, and Israel <WH3478> mine inheritance <WH5159>.
